questionTitle: He didn't have an accident because he's an ____ driver. (excellent)
Sam is good at sports. He always runs ____  (fast)
His father is a manager. He works very ____  (hard)
He won a prize. He is very ____  (happy)
She felt ____  So she stayed at home. (ill)
The weather was ____  It was cold all the time. (bad)
The exercise wasn't difficult. So we did it ____  (easy)
The soup is great. It tastes ____  (wonderful)
